name: VEIOP 2077
description:
What a horrible disaster! The catastrophe has plunged the entire city into panic. Communication systems are down and the water supply has been damaged.

But don't give up yet! The VEIOP network is here to save the day. It's your time to use this advanced technology to find a solution and save the city before it's too late...

Developed by:

  • Jose Antonio Bernal: https://vaent.itch.io
  • Daniel Martín: https://nostale.itch.io
  • Carlos Parrado: https://parrakimichi.itch.io
  • Diego Romero: https://majestic511.itch.io
  • Javier Valoria: https://javalori.itch.io
